page.title: 12LOCAL ACTIVITIES
page.content:
There are a few active social clubs in the village such as a branch of the Womens' Institute, Scouts, Guides and Cubs. There is a sports Club which supports two cricket teams and a football squad. A flourishing tennis club uses courts which belong to the manor, however many of its members come from outside the village.
As in many villages there are few community activities specifically for teenagers. A youth club was started about a year ago, but it has already ceased to meet. One of the major problems appears to be a lack of a suitable, willing leader.
This summer the village organised a Clifton Hampden Festival Weekend with events which included a concert in the Manor gardens and a Barn Dance.
